Task: What is AutoGPT?
Result:

output: AutoGPT is an open-source "AI agent" that aims to achieve a given goal by breaking it into sub-tasks and utilizing the internet and other tools in an automatic loop. It is an artificial intelligence (AI) agent that can complete complex tasks without human intervention. AutoGPT is built on the GPT-4 language model and acts autonomously, chaining together tasks to accomplish larger objectives. It can perform tasks such as research, web search, and more. AutoGPT is an experimental project that offers a powerful AI tool for various applications.
